title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (moved an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon
A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension, which isn't requested.
6) Click Ok.

Observed Behavior: The Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but with no file extension shown.
EB:
The file is, for all intents and purposes, now a generic file, as opening it will show that it is opened as text.

Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension
6) Click Ok
